item.description:
Oktoberfest Weekend

October 13

10 am - 5 pm daily

Enjoy German music, entertainment, food and beer.

Saturday - don't miss the Oberlander Hofbrau Band perform under the big tent!

Enter the homemade apple pie contest or take a ride to the top on our SkyRide!


Admission
Advanced Online Adult $8 Door $9 Skyride $ 6

From Worcester (20 minutes)
Take Rt. 290 East to exit 19 (which is 190 North).
Take Exit 5 off 190 North, which will put you onto 140 North. Follow 140 North for approx. nine miles.
Take a left onto Mile Hill Rd. and travel 1/2 mile to the Ski Area entrance on the right.
item.name: Octoberfest - Mt Wachusett
